title: How to prepare for the CSEET by self-study for the November 20 attempt and from which study material or can I prepare only from the PDFs available at the ICSI website for the entrance - Quora
tags: The Institute of Company Secretaries of India (ICSI)

response.answer_text: Yes, you can do the same. For Logical Reasoning, Current Affairs and GK, you can refer other resource materials (books, internet). For Law, Economics, try looking at past papers of CS Foundation. Hope this was helpful. All the best, -Vinaya
FOR CSEET PREPARATION U CAN TAKE YOU TUBE CLASSES, AND REST YOU CAN CAN STUDY FROM PDF GIVEN BY ICSI
